00032 /* =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00033  *   BSP (Board Support Package)
00034  *   Target : Texas Instruments EZ430-RF2500
00035  *            "MSP430 Wireless Development Tool"
00036  *   Board configuration file.
00037  * =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
00038  */
00039 
00040 #ifndef BSP_CONFIG_H
00041 #define BSP_CONFIG_H
00042 
00043 
00044 /**************************************************************************************************
00045  *                                       Configuration                                            *
00046  **************************************************************************************************
00047  */
00048 
00049 /*
00050  *  Supported clock speeds : 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 16 MHz.
00051  *  The clock configuration values for 1, 8, 12, 16 MHz are taken from configuration flash
00052  *  set at the factory and should be the most accurate.
00053  *
00054  *  NOTE!  The clock speeds are approximate as they are derived from an internal
00055  *         digitally controlled oscillator.
00056  */
00057 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT     8  /* approximate MHz */
00058 
00059 /*
00060  *  Custom clock configuration is available.  Provide values for BCSCTL1 and DCOCTL as
00061  *  shown in the example below.  The clock speed itself must be provided too.  Providing
00062  *  a custom configuration overrides the above selection.
00063  *
00064  *  #define BSP_CONFIG_CUSTOM_CLOCK_MHZ         2.1
00065  *  #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_BCSCTL1    9
00066  *  #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_DCOCTL     ( 1 << 5 )
00067  */
00068 
00069 
00070 /* ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00071  *                                Exported Clock Configuration
00072  * ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073  */
00074 #if (defined BSP_CONFIG_CUSTOM_CLOCK_MHZ)      || \
00075     (defined BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_BCSCTL1) || \
00076     (defined BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_DCOCTL)
00077 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        BSP_CONFIG_CUSTOM_CLOCK_MHZ
00078 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_BCSCTL1
00079 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_CUSTOM_DCOCTL
00080 #else
00081 
00082 #if (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 1)
00083 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        1.0
00084 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   CALBC1_1MHZ   /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00085 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    CALDCO_1MHZ   /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00086 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 2)
00087 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        2.1
00088 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   9
00089 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    ((/* DCO = */ 1 )  << 5 )
00090 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 4)
00091 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        3.9
00092 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   10
00093 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    ((/* DCO = */ 5 )  << 5 )
00094 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 6)
00095 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        6.1
00096 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   12
00097 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    ((/* DCO = */ 4 )  << 5 )
00098 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 8)
00099 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        8.0
00100 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   CALBC1_8MHZ   /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00101 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    CALDCO_8MHZ   /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00102 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 10)
00103 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        10.3
00104 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   14
00105 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    ((/* DCO = */ 2 )  << 5 )
00106 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 12)
00107 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        12.0
00108 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   CALBC1_12MHZ  /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00109 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    CALDCO_12MHZ  /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00110 #elif (BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ_SELECT == 16)
00111 #define BSP_CONFIG_CLOCK_MHZ        16.0
00112 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_BCSCTL1   CALBC1_16MHZ  /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00113 #define BSP_CONFIG_MSP430_DCOCTL    CALDCO_16MHZ  /* factory calibrated value from flash */
00114 #else
00115 #error "ERROR: Unsupported clock speed.  Custom clock speeds are possible. See comments in code."
00116 #endif
00117 
00118 #endif
00119 
00120 
00121 /**************************************************************************************************
00122  */
00123 #endif
Generated on Thu Mar 29 11:40:05 2012 by  1.4.7
